CustomField.description: The user populates this percentage field to indicate the maximum loan-to-value ratio an applicant can have to qualify for an auto-approval decision. This field filters offers presented to the applicant. By default, this field is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the maximum loan-to-value ratio an applicant must have to qualify for auto-approval in this field.
CustomField.label: Maximum Loan-to-Value
